name: Phenom Overdrive
description:
Embark on a highly dangerous mission through space. You will travel through strange locales and survive extraordinary threats caused by the recently appearing unexplained phenomena.

Your mission will be to scout the area and study the phenomena up close. It is a highly dangerous mission with a low chance of survival and zero weaponry, due to early stage risk assessment.

However, your ship is equipped with an experimental state of the art Graviton-Pulse unit. With the Graviton-Pulse unit you will be able to reach almost instant inertia regardless of speed. Letting you make some difficult maneuvers. But be careful, once the pulse subsides, all momentum returns... with interests.

Return with as much data as you can collect. Depending on it, you’ll be rewarded at the end of your journey. Humanity eagerly awaits.

Features:
  • Navigate 30 highly dangerous levels.
  • Physics based player movement and mechanics.
  • 360-degree directional analog input. Go towards the exact direction you press.
  • Simple controls uses a very minimal number of buttons. Old school style.
  • Support for controllers and mouse input.
  • Different endings based on total phenomena discovered.
